title: USB Stopped working after July 2020 Security update
content:
I have a Pixel 2 XL (not sure why it doesnt show up on the list). Everything was working fine until the July update. After that my Android Auto stopped working. I tried with my Samsung S8, everything works fine, so the head unit is OK. Tried swapping out cables, no luck. The I decided to see if there may be something with my USB, so I connected it to my PC and got the "USB Device Not Recognized" error. 
I have already tried clearing Play Services cache and Play Store cache etc. Enabling and disabling USB Debugging and reinstalling the drivers on my PC. I have also tried a Type-C to Type-A cable as well as the original cable that came with the phone.
